text: Andrey Golovko at the 2009-10 Tour de Ski. Andrey Golovko (born 1980) is a Kazakhstani cross-country skier. He competed at the Winter Olympics in 2002 in Salt Lake City, and in Turin in 2006, placing 29th in the 30 km and 29th in the 50 km. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Cross- country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Kazakhstani male cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Kazakhstan Category:Asian Games medalists in cross-country skiing Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2003 Asian Winter Games Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2007 Asian Winter Games Category:Medalists at the 2003 Asian Winter Games Category:Medalists at the 2007 Asian Winter Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Kazakhstan Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Kazakhstan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Kazakhstan
title: Andrey Golovko
